amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to pay salaries and expenses of Agriculture personnel to provide benefits described in the Food Security Act of 1985 to a person or legal entity in excess of $125,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to pay salaries and expenses of Agriculture personnel to provide benefits described in the Food Security Act of 1985 to a person or legal entity in excess of $125,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 262 (Roll no. 443).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 262 (Roll no. 443).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
